name: Space Shooter (itch) (EmmanuelWoo)
description:
this is just a simple arcade style shooter.

just added this as part of my portfolio, one of the oldest project i have, still surprised it is running completely in 4.26, i think i made this around 4.22 or 4.23. very cool.

Controls:
W,A,S,D - move the fighter left, up, down, right respectively
Left mouse click - fire default weapon
right mouse click - fire special rockets (Upon Pickup)
alt+f4 - to close the game

Reset button - resets your coin count.
